title: Calories in Lean Ground Turkey
meta_description: Get calories in lean ground turkey per 100g, plus full nutrition breakdown including protein, fat, carbs, and cooking tweaks for better tracking.
assumptions: 93% lean, 7% fat, raw; no added seasonings or binders.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by fat percentage, brand, raw vs. cooked state, and preparation method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 100g of lean ground turkey provides ~150 kcal and ~19 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp olive oil per 100 g

faqs.q: How many calories in 100g lean ground turkey?
faqs.a: About 150 kcal for 93% lean raw ground turkey.

faqs.q: What's the protein in lean ground turkey?
Does cooking change calories in lean ground turkey?
faqs.a: Yes, pan-broiling can reduce calories by ~20 per 100 g due to fat drainage.

faqs.q: How much fat is in lean ground turkey?
faqs.a: Around 8.3 g total fat per 100 g, with 2.1 g saturated.
Yes, 0 g carbs, fiber, and sugars per 100 g raw.
